documentation.text:
@title Storage
 @dev Store & retrieve value in a variable
 BASE UNITS on ETHEREUM BC: wei
 onlyOwner safety check - if we fund the recipient address setting, then we can set ourselves as the only ppl to modify the smart contract (securing our smart contract via admin access)
 Methods/modifiers needed --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 set recipient address
 check if recipient address is default or has been set
 platform pays gas fee WHEN RECIPIENT SETS ADDRESS
 v11 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 ToDo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 check for sufficient balance on SC before deactivating an award (before distributing funds)

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "this award can not accept any donations until recipient address has been set"

arguments.value: this award can not accept any donations until recipient address has been set

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "this award can not accept any donations until recipient address has been set"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "this award has already been added to the smart contract"

arguments.value: this award has already been added to the smart contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "this award has already been added to the smart contract"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "this donation exceeds available limit remaining"

arguments.value: this donation exceeds available limit remaining

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "this donation exceeds available limit remaining"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "this contract is not expired and payout will not happen"

arguments.value: this contract is not expired and payout will not happen

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "this contract is not expired and payout will not happen"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "please donate an amount greater than 0 ether"

arguments.value: please donate an amount greater than 0 ether

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "please donate an amount greater than 0 ether"
